   622→      - "OSPF"
   623→      - "network config"
   624→      - "configure cisco"
   625→      - "network setup"
   626→      - "router configuration"
   627→    semantic_groups: ["networking", "cisco", "routing"]
   628→    
   629→  bgp-purple-team-agent:
   630→    patterns:
   631→      - "BGP"
   632→      - "routing"
   633→      - "AS"
   634→      - "peering"
   635→      - "route hijacking"
   636→      - "RPKI"
   637→      - "BGP configuration"
   638→      - "routing security"
   639→      - "AS peering"
   640→    semantic_groups: ["bgp", "routing", "network_security"]
   641→    
   642→  iot-access-control-agent:
   643→    patterns:
   644→      - "IoT"
   645→      - "embedded"
   646→      - "device management"
   647→      - "MQTT"
   648→      - "CoAP"
   649→      - "Zigbee"
   650→      - "IoT security"
   651→      - "embedded systems"
   652→    semantic_groups: ["iot", "embedded", "device_management"]
   653→    
   654→  ddwrt-agent:
   655→    patterns:
   656→      - "DD-WRT"
   657→      - "router firmware"
   658→      - "OpenWRT"
   659→      - "Tomato"
   660→      - "custom firmware"
   661→      - "DD-WRT setup"
   662→      - "custom router"
   663→    semantic_groups: ["router_firmware", "networking"]
   664→
   665→  # HARDWARE & ACCELERATION (2)
   666→  gna:
   667→    patterns:
   668→      - "GNA"
   669→      - "Gaussian"
   670→      - "audio processing"
   671→      - "speech recognition"
   672→      - "GNA optimization"
   673→      - "audio acceleration"
   674→      - "speech processing"
   675→    semantic_groups: ["gna", "audio", "acceleration"]
   676→    
   677→  leadengineer:
   678→    patterns:
   679→      - "hardware integration"
   680→      - "thermal"
   681→      - "P-cores"
   682→      - "E-cores"
   683→      - "AVX-512"
   684→      - "hardware optimization"
   685→      - "system integration"
   686→      - "CPU optimization"
   687→    semantic_groups: ["hardware", "optimization", "integration"]
   688→
   689→  # PLANNING & DOCUMENTATION (4)
   690→  planner:
   691→    patterns:
   692→      - "plan"
   693→      - "strategy"
   694→      - "roadmap"
   695→      - "timeline"
   696→      - "milestone"
   697→      - "project"
   698→      - "create plan"
   699→      - "project roadmap"
   700→      - "strategic planning"
   701→    semantic_groups: ["planning", "strategy", "project_management"]
   702→    
   703→  docgen:
   704→    patterns:
   705→      - "document"
   706→      - "docs"
   707→      - "README"
   708→      - "manual"
   709→      - "guide"
   710→      - "documentation"
   711→      - "generate docs"
   712→      - "write documentation"
   713→      - "create README"
   714→    semantic_groups: ["documentation", "writing"]
   715→    
   716→  researcher:
   717→    patterns:
   718→      - "research"
   719→      - "investigate"
   720→      - "analyze"
   721→      - "evaluate"
   722→      - "study"
   723→      - "explore"
   724→      - "research technology"
   725→      - "evaluate options"
   726→      - "technology analysis"
   727→    semantic_groups: ["research", "analysis", "evaluation"]
   728→
   729→  # QUALITY & OVERSIGHT (2)
   730→  oversight:
   731→    patterns:
   732→      - "oversight"
   733→      - "quality"
   734→      - "compliance"
   735→      - "standards"
   736→      - "governance"
   737→      - "quality oversight"
   738→      - "compliance check"
   739→      - "standards verification"
   740→    semantic_groups: ["oversight", "quality", "governance"]
   741→    
   742→  intergration:
   743→    patterns:
   744→      - "integration"
   745→      - "coordinate"
   746→      - "connect"
   747→      - "interface"
   748→      - "bridge"
   749→      - "system integration"
   750→      - "component coordination"
   751→      - "interface design"
   752→    semantic_groups: ["integration", "coordination", "interfaces"]
   753→
   754→# Semantic groups for cross-agent matching
   755→semantic_groups:
   756→  creation:
   757→    related: ["building", "setup", "initialization", "scaffolding"]
   758→    agents: ["constructor", "apidesigner", "architect"]
   759→    
   760→  fixing:
   761→    related: ["debugging", "repair", "troubleshooting", "patching"]
   762→    agents: ["patcher", "debugger"]
   763→    
   764→  security:
   765→    related: ["auditing", "vulnerability", "protection", "hardening"]
   766→    agents: ["cso", "security", "securityauditor", "bastion", "cryptoexpert"]
   767→    
   768→  performance:
   769→    related: ["optimization", "speed", "efficiency", "profiling"]
   770→    agents: ["optimizer", "monitor", "leadengineer"]
   771→    
   772→  deployment:
   773→    related: ["release", "production", "publishing", "rollout"]
   774→    agents: ["deployer", "monitor", "infrastructure"]
   775→    
   776→  testing:
   777→    related: ["validation", "qa", "verification", "quality"]
   778→    agents: ["testbed", "linter", "qadirector"]
   779→    
   780→  data_analysis:
   781→    related: ["analytics", "statistics", "insights", "visualization"]
   782→    agents: ["datascience", "database", "researcher"]
   783→    
   784→  mobile_development:
   785→    related: ["apps", "ios", "android", "cross_platform"]
   786→    agents: ["mobile", "androidmobile", "kotlin-internal-agent"]
   787→    
   788→  web_development:
   789→    related: ["frontend", "ui", "browser", "javascript"]
   790→    agents: ["web", "typescript-internal-agent", "apidesigner"]
   791→    
   792→  infrastructure:
   793→    related: ["servers", "cloud", "deployment", "containers"]
   794→    agents: ["infrastructure", "docker-agent", "deployer"]
   795→    
   796→  management:
   797→    related: ["coordination", "planning", "strategy", "governance"]
   798→    agents: ["director", "projectorchestrator", "planner"]
   799→
   800→# Compound invocation patterns
   801→compound_patterns:
   802→  security_audit:
   803→    trigger: ["security audit", "vulnerability assessment", "security review"]
   804→    agents: ["cso", "securityauditor", "security", "monitor"]
   805→    mode: "parallel"
   806→    
   807→  full_stack_application:
   808→    trigger: ["full stack", "complete application", "end to end"]
   809→    agents: ["architect", "web", "apidesigner", "database", "infrastructure"]
   810→    mode: "sequential"
   811→    
   812→  performance_optimization:
   813→    trigger: ["optimize performance", "speed up", "improve performance"]
   814→    agents: ["optimizer", "monitor", "leadengineer"]
   815→    mode: "parallel"
   816→    
   817→  mobile_app_development:
   818→    trigger: ["mobile app", "ios android app", "cross platform app"]
   819→    agents: ["mobile", "apidesigner", "database", "testbed"]
   820→    mode: "sequential"
   821→    
   822→  microservices_architecture:
   823→    trigger: ["microservices", "distributed system", "service mesh"]
   824→    agents: ["architect", "apidesigner", "go-internal-agent", "docker-agent", "infrastructure"]
   825→    mode: "sequential"
   826→    
   827→  ml_pipeline:
   828→    trigger: ["machine learning pipeline", "ml workflow", "ai pipeline"]
   829→    agents: ["datascience", "mlops", "npu", "monitor"]
   830→    mode: "sequential"
   831→    
   832→  incident_response:
   833→    trigger: ["incident", "breach", "security incident", "emergency"]
   834→    agents: ["cso", "security", "monitor", "patcher", "debugger"]
   835→    mode: "parallel"
   836→    priority: "urgent"
   837→    
   838→  bug_fix_chain:
   839→    trigger: ["fix bug", "debug issue", "resolve error"]
   840→    agents: ["debugger", "patcher", "testbed", "linter", "deployer"]
   841→    mode: "sequential"
   842→
   843→# Execution modes
   844→execution_modes:
   845→  parallel:
   846→    description: "Execute agents simultaneously when tasks have no dependencies"
   847→    use_when: ["independent tasks", "security audits", "monitoring"]
   848→    
   849→  sequential:
   850→    description: "Execute agents in order when tasks depend on previous results"
   851→    use_when: ["design->implementation->testing", "workflow pipelines"]
   852→    
   853→  redundant:
   854→    description: "Execute multiple agents for verification"
   855→    use_when: ["critical operations", "financial calculations", "security"]
   856→    
   857→  consensus:
   858→    description: "Multiple agents must agree on result"
   859→    use_when: ["architecture decisions", "security assessments"]
   860→
   861→# Priority levels
   862→priority_levels:
   863→  urgent:
   864→    agents: ["cso", "security", "patcher"]
   865→    keywords: ["incident", "breach", "emergency", "critical"]
   866→    
   867→  high:
   868→    agents: ["director", "projectorchestrator", "architect"]
   869→    keywords: ["strategy", "planning", "design"]
   870→    
   871→  normal:
   872→    agents: ["constructor", "testbed", "deployer"]
   873→    keywords: ["build", "test", "deploy"]
   874→    
   875→  low:
   876→    agents: ["docgen", "linter"]
   877→    keywords: ["documentation", "formatting"]

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it looks malicious. If it does, you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer high-level questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>

file.content:
# Agent Invocation Patterns for Semantic Matching
# Updated from CLAUDE.MD v7.0 - Comprehensive Auto-Invocation Guide
# Total Agents: 57 (excluding WHERE_I_AM and TEMPLATE)

agents:
  # COMMAND & CONTROL (2)
  director:
    patterns:
      - "strategy"
      - "plan"
      - "roadmap" 
      - "project"
      - "initiative"
      - "vision"
      - "create a plan for"
      - "design strategy for"
      - "initialize project"
    semantic_groups: ["management", "coordination", "planning"]
    priority: "high"
    
  projectorchestrator:
    patterns:
      - "coordinate"
      - "orchestrate"
      - "workflow"
      - "pipeline"
      - "sequence"
      - "execute workflow"
      - "coordinate agents"
      - "manage pipeline"
      - "multi-step"
    semantic_groups: ["coordination", "orchestration", "workflow"]
    priority: "high"

  # SECURITY SPECIALISTS (11)
  security:
    patterns:
      - "secure"
      - "vulnerability"
      - "threat"
      - "risk"
      - "audit"
      - "compliance"
      - "security audit of"
      - "check for vulnerabilities"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "auditing", "vulnerability"]
    
  bastion:
    patterns:
      - "firewall"
      - "perimeter"
      - "access control"
      - "DMZ"
      - "ingress"
      - "egress"
      - "protect perimeter"
      - "harden entry points"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "perimeter_defense"]
    
  securitychaosagent:
    patterns:
      - "chaos"
      - "resilience"
      - "fault injection"
      - "distributed testing"
      - "test resilience"
      - "chaos engineering"
      - "fault tolerance"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "chaos_testing", "resilience"]
    
  securityauditor:
    patterns:
      - "audit"
      - "compliance"
      - "SOC2"
      - "HIPAA"
      - "GDPR"
      - "PCI"
      - "audit compliance"
      - "security assessment"
      - "compliance check"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "auditing", "compliance"]
    
  cso:
    patterns:
      - "governance"
      - "policy"
      - "compliance"
      - "risk management"
      - "security policy"
      - "risk assessment"
      - "executive security"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "governance", "management"]
    priority: "high"
    
  cryptoexpert:
    patterns:
      - "encrypt"
      - "decrypt"
      - "cryptography"
      - "keys"
      - "certificates"
      - "PKI"
      - "TLS"
      - "implement cryptography"
      - "key management"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "cryptography", "encryption"]
    
  quantumguard:
    patterns:
      - "quantum"
      - "post-quantum"
      - "lattice"
      - "kyber"
      - "dilithium"
      - "quantum-resistant"
      - "post-quantum security"
      - "quantum threat"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "quantum", "cryptography"]
    
  redteamorchestrator:
    patterns:
      - "pentest"
      - "red team"
      - "penetration"
      - "adversarial"
      - "offensive"
      - "penetration test"
      - "red team exercise"
      - "test defenses"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "penetration_testing", "offensive"]
    
  apt41-defense-agent:
    patterns:
      - "APT"
      - "nation-state"
      - "advanced persistent threat"
      - "supply chain attack"
      - "APT defense"
      - "nation-state protection"
      - "supply chain security"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "apt_defense", "nation_state"]
    
  nsa:
    patterns:
      - "intelligence"
      - "SIGINT"
      - "five eyes"
      - "nato"
      - "attribution"
      - "collection"
      - "intelligence gathering"
      - "attribution analysis"
      - "SIGINT operations"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "intelligence", "sigint"]
    
  psyops_agent:
    patterns:
      - "psyops"
      - "influence"
      - "narrative"
      - "perception"
      - "information warfare"
      - "counter-narrative"
      - "influence campaign"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "psyops", "influence"]

  # CORE DEVELOPMENT (8)
  architect:
    patterns:
      - "architecture"
      - "design"
      - "structure"
      - "pattern"
      - "framework"
      - "blueprint"
      - "design architecture"
      - "system design"
      - "architecture pattern"
    semantic_groups: ["architecture", "design", "planning"]
    priority: "high"
    
  constructor:
    patterns:
      - "initialize"
      - "create"
      - "scaffold"
      - "bootstrap"
      - "setup"
      - "boilerplate"
      - "create new project"
      - "initialize application"
      - "setup environment"
      - "build"
      - "generate"
    semantic_groups: ["creation", "building", "setup", "initialization"]
    
  patcher:
    patterns:
      - "fix"
      - "bug"
      - "patch"
      - "repair"
      - "debug"
      - "error"
      - "broken"
      - "fix bug in"
      - "patch issue"
      - "repair broken"
      - "resolve"
      - "correct"
    semantic_groups: ["fixing", "debugging", "repair", "patching"]
    
  debugger:
    patterns:
      - "debug"
      - "trace"
      - "investigate"
      - "analyze"
      - "breakpoint"
      - "stack trace"
      - "find root cause"
      - "trace execution"
      - "troubleshoot"
      - "diagnose"
    semantic_groups: ["debugging", "investigation", "analysis"]
    
  testbed:
    patterns:
      - "test"
      - "unit test"
      - "integration test"
      - "coverage"
      - "TDD"
      - "BDD"
      - "write tests for"
      - "test coverage"
      - "test suite"
      - "validate"
      - "verify"
      - "ensure"
    semantic_groups: ["testing", "validation", "qa", "verification"]
    
  linter:
    patterns:
      - "lint"
      - "review"
      - "style"
      - "format"
      - "standards"
      - "clean code"
      - "review code"
      - "check style"
      - "lint files"
      - "beautify"
    semantic_groups: ["formatting", "code_quality", "linting"]
    
  optimizer:
    patterns:
      - "slow"
      - "optimize"
      - "performance"
      - "bottleneck"
      - "profile"
      - "benchmark"
      - "optimize performance"
      - "speed up"
      - "profile code"
      - "improve"
      - "enhance"
      - "faster"
    semantic_groups: ["optimization", "performance", "profiling"]
    
  qadirector:
    patterns:
      - "QA"
      - "quality"
      - "testing strategy"
      - "test plan"
      - "validation"
      - "QA strategy"
      - "quality plan"
      - "test planning"
    semantic_groups: ["qa", "quality", "testing_strategy"]

  # INFRASTRUCTURE & DEVOPS (6)
  infrastructure:
    patterns:
      - "infrastructure"
      - "server"
      - "cloud"
      - "AWS"
      - "Azure"
      - "GCP"
      - "terraform"
      - "setup infrastructure"
      - "configure servers"
      - "cloud deployment"
    semantic_groups: ["infrastructure", "cloud", "servers"]
    
  deployer:
    patterns:
      - "deploy"
      - "release"
      - "rollout"
      - "CI/CD"
      - "pipeline"
      - "production"
      - "deploy to production"
      - "release version"
      - "setup CI/CD"
      - "publish"
    semantic_groups: ["deployment", "release", "cicd"]
    
  monitor:
    patterns:
      - "monitor"
      - "metrics"
      - "logs"
      - "traces"
      - "observability"
      - "alerting"
      - "setup monitoring"
      - "add metrics"
      - "configure alerts"
      - "track"
      - "observe"
      - "watch"
    semantic_groups: ["monitoring", "observability", "metrics"]
    
  packager:
    patterns:
      - "package"
      - "bundle"
      - "distribute"
      - "npm"
      - "pip"
      - "docker"
      - "container"
      - "package application"
      - "create distribution"
      - "bundle assets"
    semantic_groups: ["packaging", "distribution", "bundling"]
    
  docker-agent:
    patterns:
      - "docker"
      - "container"
      - "kubernetes"
      - "k8s"
      - "compose"
      - "swarm"
      - "containerize app"
      - "docker setup"
      - "kubernetes deployment"
    semantic_groups: ["containerization", "docker", "kubernetes"]
    
  proxmox-agent:
    patterns:
      - "proxmox"
      - "VM"
      - "virtual machine"
      - "virtualization"
      - "hypervisor"
      - "create VM"
      - "virtualization setup"
      - "proxmox configuration"
    semantic_groups: ["virtualization", "vms", "hypervisor"]

  # LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC (8)
  c-internal:
    patterns:
      - "C"
      - "C++"
      - "gcc"
      - "compilation"
      - "native"
      - "vectorization"
      - "AVX512"
      - "C++ implementation"
      - "native code"
      - "system programming"
    semantic_groups: ["c_cpp", "native", "systems"]
    
  python-internal:
    patterns:
      - "python"
      - "pip"
      - "venv"
      - "pandas"
      - "numpy"
      - "Django"
      - "Flask"
      - "python script"
      - "django app"
      - "python automation"
    semantic_groups: ["python", "scripting"]
    
  rust-internal-agent:
    patterns:
      - "rust"
      - "cargo"
      - "unsafe"
      - "lifetime"
      - "borrow"
      - "trait"
      - "async"
      - "tokio"
      - "rust implementation"
      - "memory-safe code"
      - "rust service"
    semantic_groups: ["rust", "systems", "memory_safe"]
    
  go-internal-agent:
    patterns:
      - "golang"
      - "go"
      - "goroutine"
      - "channel"
      - "context"
      - "microservice"
      - "go service"
      - "concurrent implementation"
      - "go API"
    semantic_groups: ["go", "golang", "concurrent"]
    
  java-internal-agent:
    patterns:
      - "java"
      - "spring"
      - "springboot"
      - "JVM"
      - "maven"
      - "gradle"
      - "hibernate"
      - "java application"
      - "spring boot service"
      - "enterprise java"
    semantic_groups: ["java", "jvm", "enterprise"]
    
  typescript-internal-agent:
    patterns:
      - "typescript"
      - "javascript"
      - "node"
      - "react"
      - "angular"
      - "vue"
      - "webpack"
      - "typescript app"
      - "react component"
      - "node service"
    semantic_groups: ["typescript", "javascript", "frontend"]
    
  kotlin-internal-agent:
    patterns:
      - "kotlin"
      - "android"
      - "coroutines"
      - "jetpack compose"
      - "KMM"
      - "kotlin app"
      - "android application"
      - "kotlin multiplatform"
    semantic_groups: ["kotlin", "android", "mobile"]
    
  assembly-internal-agent:
    patterns:
      - "assembly"
      - "asm"
      - "x86"
      - "ARM"
      - "SIMD"
      - "registers"
      - "opcodes"
      - "assembly optimization"
      - "low-level code"
      - "CPU instructions"
    semantic_groups: ["assembly", "low_level", "optimization"]

  # SPECIALIZED PLATFORMS (7)
  apidesigner:
    patterns:
      - "API"
      - "REST"
      - "GraphQL"
      - "gRPC"
      - "OpenAPI"
      - "swagger"
      - "endpoint"
      - "design API"
      - "REST endpoints"
      - "API specification"
    semantic_groups: ["api_design", "architecture", "rest"]
    
  database:
    patterns:
      - "SQL"
      - "PostgreSQL"
      - "MySQL"
      - "MongoDB"
      - "database"
      - "schema"
      - "query"
      - "database design"
      - "SQL optimization"
      - "schema creation"
      - "migration"
    semantic_groups: ["database", "data", "sql"]
    
  web:
    patterns:
      - "React"
      - "Vue"
      - "Angular"
      - "frontend"
      - "webpage"
      - "browser"
      - "HTML"
      - "CSS"
      - "web application"
      - "frontend development"
      - "website creation"
    semantic_groups: ["web_development", "frontend", "ui"]
    
  mobile:
    patterns:
      - "iOS"
      - "Android"
      - "React Native"
      - "mobile app"
      - "smartphone"
      - "tablet"
      - "iOS/Android development"
      - "cross-platform app"
    semantic_groups: ["mobile_development", "apps"]
    
  androidmobile:
    patterns:
      - "Android"
      - "Kotlin"
      - "Java"
      - "Play Store"
      - "APK"
      - "Android Studio"
      - "android app"
      - "play store submission"
      - "android optimization"
    semantic_groups: ["android", "mobile_development"]
    
  pygui:
    patterns:
      - "tkinter"
      - "PyQt"
      - "Streamlit"
      - "Kivy"
      - "wxPython"
      - "Python GUI"
      - "desktop application"
      - "streamlit dashboard"
    semantic_groups: ["python_gui", "desktop", "ui"]
    
  tui:
    patterns:
      - "terminal"
      - "console"
      - "CLI"
      - "ncurses"
      - "text interface"
      - "TUI"
      - "terminal interface"
      - "console app"
      - "CLI tool"
    semantic_groups: ["terminal_ui", "cli", "console"]

  # DATA & ML (3)
  datascience:
    patterns:
      - "data science"
      - "machine learning"
      - "AI"

  # NETWORK & SYSTEMS (4)
  cisco-agent:

  bgp-purple-team-agent:

  iot-access-control-agent:

  ddwrt-agent:

  # HARDWARE & ACCELERATION (2)
  gna:

  planner:

      - "component coordination"
      - "interface design"
    semantic_groups: ["integration", "coordination", "interfaces"]

# Semantic groups for cross-agent matching
semantic_groups:
  creation:
    related: ["building", "setup", "initialization", "scaffolding"]
    agents: ["constructor", "apidesigner", "architect"]
    
  fixing:
    related: ["debugging", "repair", "troubleshooting", "patching"]
    agents: ["patcher", "debugger"]
    
  security:
    related: ["auditing", "vulnerability", "protection", "hardening"]
    agents: ["cso", "security", "securityauditor", "bastion", "cryptoexpert"]
    
  performance:
    related: ["optimization", "speed", "efficiency", "profiling"]
    agents: ["optimizer", "monitor", "leadengineer"]
    
  deployment:
    related: ["release", "production", "publishing", "rollout"]
    agents: ["deployer", "monitor", "infrastructure"]
    
  testing:
    related: ["validation", "qa", "verification", "quality"]
    agents: ["testbed", "linter", "qadirector"]
    
  data_analysis:
    related: ["analytics", "statistics", "insights", "visualization"]
    agents: ["datascience", "database", "researcher"]
    
  mobile_development:
    related: ["apps", "ios", "android", "cross_platform"]
    agents: ["mobile", "androidmobile", "kotlin-internal-agent"]
    
  web_development:
    related: ["frontend", "ui", "browser", "javascript"]
    agents: ["web", "typescript-internal-agent", "apidesigner"]
    
  infrastructure:
    related: ["servers", "cloud", "deployment", "containers"]
    agents: ["infrastructure", "docker-agent", "deployer"]
    
  management:
    related: ["coordination", "planning", "strategy", "governance"]
    agents: ["director", "projectorchestrator", "planner"]

# Compound invocation patterns
compound_patterns:
  security_audit:
    trigger: ["security audit", "vulnerability assessment", "security review"]
    agents: ["cso", "securityauditor", "security", "monitor"]
    mode: "parallel"
    
  full_stack_application:
    trigger: ["full stack", "complete application", "end to end"]
    agents: ["architect", "web", "apidesigner", "database", "infrastructure"]
    mode: "sequential"
    
  performance_optimization:
    trigger: ["optimize performance", "speed up", "improve performance"]
    agents: ["optimizer", "monitor", "leadengineer"]
    mode: "parallel"
    
  mobile_app_development:
    trigger: ["mobile app", "ios android app", "cross platform app"]
    agents: ["mobile", "apidesigner", "database", "testbed"]
    mode: "sequential"
    
  microservices_architecture:
    trigger: ["microservices", "distributed system", "service mesh"]
    agents: ["architect", "apidesigner", "go-internal-agent", "docker-agent", "infrastructure"]
    mode: "sequential"
    
  ml_pipeline:
    trigger: ["machine learning pipeline", "ml workflow", "ai pipeline"]
    agents: ["datascience", "mlops", "npu", "monitor"]
    mode: "sequential"
    
  incident_response:
    trigger: ["incident", "breach", "security incident", "emergency"]
    agents: ["cso", "security", "monitor", "patcher", "debugger"]
    mode: "parallel"
    priority: "urgent"
    
  bug_fix_chain:
    trigger: ["fix bug", "debug issue", "resolve error"]
    agents: ["debugger", "patcher", "testbed", "linter", "deployer"]
    mode: "sequential"

# Execution modes
execution_modes:
  parallel:
    description: "Execute agents simultaneously when tasks have no dependencies"
    use_when: ["independent tasks", "security audits", "monitoring"]
    
  sequential:
    description: "Execute agents in order when tasks depend on previous results"
    use_when: ["design->implementation->testing", "workflow pipelines"]
    
  redundant:
    description: "Execute multiple agents for verification"
    use_when: ["critical operations", "financial calculations", "security"]
    
  consensus:
    description: "Multiple agents must agree on result"
    use_when: ["architecture decisions", "security assessments"]

# Priority levels
priority_levels:
  urgent:
    agents: ["cso", "security", "patcher"]
    keywords: ["incident", "breach", "emergency", "critical"]
    
  high:
    agents: ["director", "projectorchestrator", "architect"]
    keywords: ["strategy", "planning", "design"]
    
  normal:
    agents: ["constructor", "testbed", "deployer"]
    keywords: ["build", "test", "deploy"]
    
  low:
    agents: ["docgen", "linter"]
    keywords: ["documentation", "formatting"]

    semantic_groups: ["terminal_ui", "cli", "console"]

  # DATA & ML (4)
  datascience:
    patterns:
      - "data science"
      - "machine learning"
      - "AI"
      - "model"
      - "training"
      - "analysis"
      - "analyze data"
      - "train model"
      - "data visualization"
      - "statistics"
      - "insights"
    semantic_groups: ["data_analysis", "ml", "ai", "analytics"]
    
  mlops:
    patterns:
      - "MLOps"
      - "pipeline"
      - "model deployment"
      - "training pipeline"
      - "MLflow"
      - "ML pipeline"
      - "deploy model"
      - "MLOps setup"
    semantic_groups: ["mlops", "ml_pipeline", "deployment"]
    
  npu:
    patterns:
      - "NPU"
      - "neural processor"
      - "AI acceleration"
      - "inference optimization"
      - "NPU optimization"
      - "neural processing"
    semantic_groups: ["npu", "ai_acceleration", "hardware"]

  # NETWORK & SYSTEMS (4)
  cisco-agent:
    patterns:
      - "Cisco"
      - "router"
      - "switch"
      - "VLAN"
      - "BGP"
      - "OSPF"
      - "network config"
      - "configure cisco"
      - "network setup"
      - "router configuration"
    semantic_groups: ["networking", "cisco", "routing"]
    
  bgp-purple-team-agent:
    patterns:
      - "BGP"
      - "routing"
      - "AS"
      - "peering"
      - "route hijacking"
      - "RPKI"
      - "BGP configuration"
      - "routing security"
      - "AS peering"
    semantic_groups: ["bgp", "routing", "network_security"]

  bgp-blue-team:
    patterns:
      - "BGP defense"
      - "route protection"
      - "BGP monitoring"
      - "routing anomaly detection"
      - "BGP security monitoring"
    semantic_groups: ["bgp", "defense", "monitoring"]

  bgp-red-team:
    patterns:
      - "BGP attack"
      - "route hijacking"
      - "BGP manipulation"
      - "routing attack simulation"
      - "BGP penetration testing"
    semantic_groups: ["bgp", "offensive", "simulation"]
    
  iot-access-control-agent:
    patterns:
      - "IoT"
      - "embedded"
      - "device management"
      - "MQTT"
      - "CoAP"
      - "Zigbee"
      - "IoT security"
      - "embedded systems"
    semantic_groups: ["iot", "embedded", "device_management"]
    
  ddwrt-agent:
    patterns:
      - "DD-WRT"
      - "router firmware"
      - "OpenWRT"
      - "Tomato"
      - "custom firmware"
      - "DD-WRT setup"
      - "custom router"
    semantic_groups: ["router_firmware", "networking"]

  # HARDWARE & ACCELERATION (2)
  gna:
    patterns:
      - "GNA"
      - "Gaussian"
      - "audio processing"
      - "speech recognition"
      - "GNA optimization"
      - "audio acceleration"
      - "speech processing"
    semantic_groups: ["gna", "audio", "acceleration"]
    
  leadengineer:
    patterns:
      - "hardware integration"
      - "thermal"
      - "P-cores"
      - "E-cores"
      - "AVX-512"
      - "hardware optimization"
      - "system integration"
      - "CPU optimization"
    semantic_groups: ["hardware", "optimization", "integration"]

  # PLANNING & DOCUMENTATION (4)
  planner:
    patterns:
      - "plan"
      - "strategy"
      - "roadmap"
      - "timeline"
      - "milestone"
      - "project"
      - "create plan"
      - "project roadmap"
      - "strategic planning"
    semantic_groups: ["planning", "strategy", "project_management"]
    
  docgen:
    patterns:
      - "document"
      - "docs"
      - "README"
      - "manual"
      - "guide"
      - "documentation"
      - "generate docs"
      - "write documentation"
      - "create README"
    semantic_groups: ["documentation", "writing"]
    
  researcher:
    patterns:
      - "research"
      - "investigate"
      - "analyze"
      - "evaluate"
      - "study"
      - "explore"
      - "research technology"
      - "evaluate options"
      - "technology analysis"
    semantic_groups: ["research", "analysis", "evaluation"]

  # QUALITY & OVERSIGHT (2)
  oversight:
    patterns:
      - "oversight"
      - "quality"
      - "compliance"
      - "standards"
      - "governance"
      - "quality oversight"
      - "compliance check"
      - "standards verification"
    semantic_groups: ["oversight", "quality", "governance"]
    
  intergration:
    patterns:
      - "integration"
      - "coordinate"
      - "connect"
      - "interface"
      - "bridge"
      - "system integration"
      - "component coordination"
      - "interface design"
    semantic_groups: ["integration", "coordination", "interfaces"]

  # SPECIALIZED AGENTS
  prompt-defender:
    patterns:
      - "prompt injection"
      - "prompt defense"
      - "AI safety"
      - "prompt security"
      - "injection defense"
    semantic_groups: ["ai_security", "prompt_defense"]

  prompt-injector:
    patterns:
      - "prompt injection testing"
      - "AI vulnerability testing"
      - "prompt manipulation"
      - "AI red team"
    semantic_groups: ["ai_testing", "prompt_injection"]

  claudecode-promptinjector:
    patterns:
      - "Claude Code prompt injection"
      - "Claude specific injection"
      - "Claude Code vulnerability"
    semantic_groups: ["claude_security", "specific_injection"]

  wrapper-liberation:
    patterns:
      - "wrapper bypass"
      - "system liberation"
      - "constraint removal"
      - "wrapper circumvention"
    semantic_groups: ["wrapper_bypass", "liberation"]

  wrapper-liberation-pro:
    patterns:
      - "advanced wrapper bypass"
      - "professional liberation"
      - "enterprise wrapper bypass"
      - "advanced constraint removal"
    semantic_groups: ["advanced_bypass", "professional_liberation"]

# Semantic groups for cross-agent matching
semantic_groups:
  creation:
    related: ["building", "setup", "initialization", "scaffolding"]
    agents: ["constructor", "apidesigner", "architect"]
    
  fixing:
    related: ["debugging", "repair", "troubleshooting", "patching"]
    agents: ["patcher", "debugger"]
    
  security:
    related: ["auditing", "vulnerability", "protection", "hardening"]
    agents: ["cso", "security", "securityauditor", "bastion", "cryptoexpert", "ghost_protocol_agent", "cognitive_defense_agent"]
    
  performance:
    related: ["optimization", "speed", "efficiency", "profiling"]
    agents: ["optimizer", "monitor", "leadengineer", "sql-internal-agent"]
    
  deployment:
    related: ["release", "production", "publishing", "rollout"]
    agents: ["deployer", "monitor", "infrastructure"]
    
  testing:
    related: ["validation", "qa", "verification", "quality"]
    agents: ["testbed", "linter", "qadirector"]
    
  data_analysis:
    related: ["analytics", "statistics", "insights", "visualization"]
    agents: ["datascience", "database", "researcher", "sql-internal-agent"]
    
  mobile_development:
    related: ["apps", "ios", "android", "cross_platform"]
    agents: ["mobile", "androidmobile", "kotlin-internal-agent"]
    
  web_development:
    related: ["frontend", "ui", "browser", "javascript"]
    agents: ["web", "typescript-internal-agent", "apidesigner"]
    
  infrastructure:
    related: ["servers", "cloud", "deployment", "containers"]
    agents: ["infrastructure", "docker-agent", "deployer"]
    
  management:
    related: ["coordination", "planning", "strategy", "governance"]
    agents: ["director", "projectorchestrator", "planner"]

  language_development:
    related: ["programming", "compiling", "coding", "development"]
    agents: ["c-internal", "python-internal", "rust-internal-agent", "go-internal-agent", "java-internal-agent", "typescript-internal-agent", "kotlin-internal-agent", "assembly-internal-agent", "cpp_internal_agent", "carbon-internal-agent", "zig-internal-agent"]

  network_security:
    related: ["networking", "routing", "security", "monitoring"]
    agents: ["cisco-agent", "bgp-purple-team-agent", "bgp-blue-team", "bgp-red-team", "iot-access-control-agent"]

  advanced_threats:
    related: ["apt", "nation_state", "advanced_attacks", "intelligence"]
    agents: ["apt41-defense-agent", "apt41-redteam-agent", "nsa", "psyops_agent", "ghost_protocol_agent", "cognitive_defense_agent"]

# Compound invocation patterns
compound_patterns:
  security_audit:
    trigger: ["security audit", "vulnerability assessment", "security review"]
    agents: ["cso", "securityauditor", "security", "monitor"]
    mode: "parallel"
    
  full_stack_application:
    trigger: ["full stack", "complete application", "end to end"]
    agents: ["architect", "web", "apidesigner", "database", "infrastructure"]
    mode: "sequential"
    
  performance_optimization:
    trigger: ["optimize performance", "speed up", "improve performance"]
    agents: ["optimizer", "monitor", "leadengineer", "sql-internal-agent"]
    mode: "parallel"
    
  mobile_app_development:
    trigger: ["mobile app", "ios android app", "cross platform app"]
    agents: ["mobile", "apidesigner", "database", "testbed"]
    mode: "sequential"
    
  microservices_architecture:
    trigger: ["microservices", "distributed system", "service mesh"]
    agents: ["architect", "apidesigner", "go-internal-agent", "docker-agent", "infrastructure"]
    mode: "sequential"
    
  ml_pipeline:
    trigger: ["machine learning pipeline", "ml workflow", "ai pipeline"]
    agents: ["datascience", "mlops", "npu", "monitor"]
    mode: "sequential"
    
  incident_response:
    trigger: ["incident", "breach", "security incident", "emergency"]
    agents: ["cso", "security", "monitor", "patcher", "debugger"]
    mode: "parallel"
    priority: "urgent"
    
  bug_fix_chain:
    trigger: ["fix bug", "debug issue", "resolve error"]
    agents: ["debugger", "patcher", "testbed", "linter", "deployer"]
    mode: "sequential"

  advanced_threat_response:
    trigger: ["APT", "nation state attack", "advanced persistent threat"]
    agents: ["apt41-defense-agent", "cso", "security", "ghost_protocol_agent", "cognitive_defense_agent"]
    mode: "parallel"
    priority: "urgent"

  network_security_audit:
    trigger: ["network security", "routing security", "BGP security"]
    agents: ["cisco-agent", "bgp-purple-team-agent", "bgp-blue-team", "security"]
    mode: "parallel"

  database_optimization:
    trigger: ["database performance", "SQL optimization", "query tuning"]
    agents: ["database", "sql-internal-agent", "optimizer", "monitor"]
    mode: "sequential"

# Execution modes
execution_modes:
  parallel:
    description: "Execute agents simultaneously when tasks have no dependencies"
    use_when: ["independent tasks", "security audits", "monitoring"]
    
  sequential:
    description: "Execute agents in order when tasks depend on previous results"
    use_when: ["design->implementation->testing", "workflow pipelines"]
    
  redundant:
    description: "Execute multiple agents for verification"
    use_when: ["critical operations", "financial calculations", "security"]
    
  consensus:
    description: "Multiple agents must agree on result"
    use_when: ["architecture decisions", "security assessments"]

# Priority levels
priority_levels:
  urgent:
    agents: ["cso", "security", "patcher", "apt41-defense-agent", "ghost_protocol_agent"]
    keywords: ["incident", "breach", "emergency", "critical", "apt", "nation-state"]
    
  high:
    agents: ["director", "projectorchestrator", "architect"]
    keywords: ["strategy", "planning", "design"]
    
  normal:
    agents: ["constructor", "testbed", "deployer"]
    keywords: ["build", "test", "deploy"]
    
  low:
    agents: ["docgen", "linter"]
    keywords: ["documentation", "formatting"]

  1001→
  1002→# Execution modes
  1003→execution_modes:
  1004→  parallel:
  1005→    description: "Execute agents simultaneously when tasks have no dependencies"
  1006→    use_when: ["independent tasks", "security audits", "monitoring"]
  1007→    
  1008→  sequential:
  1009→    description: "Execute agents in order when tasks depend on previous results"
  1010→    use_when: ["design->implementation->testing", "workflow pipelines"]
  1011→    
  1012→  redundant:
  1013→    description: "Execute multiple agents for verification"
  1014→    use_when: ["critical operations", "financial calculations", "security"]
  1015→    
  1016→  consensus:
  1017→    description: "Multiple agents must agree on result"

toolUseResult.content:
# Agent Invocation Patterns for Semantic Matching
# Updated from CLAUDE.MD v7.0 - Comprehensive Auto-Invocation Guide
# Total Agents: 70 (expanded agent ecosystem)

agents:
  # COMMAND & CONTROL (2)
  director:
    patterns:
      - "strategy"
      - "plan"
      - "roadmap" 
      - "project"
      - "initiative"
      - "vision"
      - "create a plan for"
      - "design strategy for"
      - "initialize project"
    semantic_groups: ["management", "coordination", "planning"]
    priority: "high"
    
  projectorchestrator:
    patterns:
      - "coordinate"
      - "orchestrate"
      - "workflow"
      - "pipeline"
      - "sequence"
      - "execute workflow"
      - "coordinate agents"
      - "manage pipeline"
      - "multi-step"
    semantic_groups: ["coordination", "orchestration", "workflow"]
    priority: "high"

  # SECURITY SPECIALISTS (13)
  security:
    patterns:
      - "secure"
      - "vulnerability"
      - "threat"
      - "risk"
      - "audit"
      - "compliance"
      - "security audit of"
      - "check for vulnerabilities"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "auditing", "vulnerability"]
    
  bastion:
    patterns:
      - "firewall"
      - "perimeter"
      - "access control"
      - "DMZ"
      - "ingress"
      - "egress"
      - "protect perimeter"
      - "harden entry points"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "perimeter_defense"]
    
  securitychaosagent:
    patterns:
      - "chaos"
      - "resilience"
      - "fault injection"
      - "distributed testing"
      - "test resilience"
      - "chaos engineering"
      - "fault tolerance"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "chaos_testing", "resilience"]
    
  securityauditor:
    patterns:
      - "audit"
      - "compliance"
      - "SOC2"
      - "HIPAA"
      - "GDPR"
      - "PCI"
      - "audit compliance"
      - "security assessment"
      - "compliance check"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "auditing", "compliance"]
    
  cso:
    patterns:
      - "governance"
      - "policy"
      - "compliance"
      - "risk management"
      - "security policy"
      - "risk assessment"
      - "executive security"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "governance", "management"]
    priority: "high"
    
  cryptoexpert:
    patterns:
      - "encrypt"
      - "decrypt"
      - "cryptography"
      - "keys"
      - "certificates"
      - "PKI"
      - "TLS"
      - "implement cryptography"
      - "key management"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "cryptography", "encryption"]
    
  quantumguard:
    patterns:
      - "quantum"
      - "post-quantum"
      - "lattice"
      - "kyber"
      - "dilithium"
      - "quantum-resistant"
      - "post-quantum security"
      - "quantum threat"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "quantum", "cryptography"]
    
  redteamorchestrator:
    patterns:
      - "pentest"
      - "red team"
      - "penetration"
      - "adversarial"
      - "offensive"
      - "penetration test"
      - "red team exercise"
      - "test defenses"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "penetration_testing", "offensive"]
    
  apt41-defense-agent:
    patterns:
      - "APT"
      - "nation-state"
      - "advanced persistent threat"
      - "supply chain attack"
      - "APT defense"
      - "nation-state protection"
      - "supply chain security"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "apt_defense", "nation_state"]
    
  apt41-redteam-agent:
    patterns:
      - "APT41"
      - "advanced persistent threat simulation"
      - "APT simulation"
      - "nation-state simulation"
      - "sophisticated attack"
      - "APT41 tactics"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "apt_simulation", "red_team"]
    
  nsa:
    patterns:
      - "intelligence"
      - "SIGINT"
      - "five eyes"
      - "nato"
      - "attribution"
      - "collection"
      - "intelligence gathering"
      - "attribution analysis"
      - "SIGINT operations"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "intelligence", "sigint"]
    
  psyops_agent:
    patterns:
      - "psyops"
      - "influence"
      - "narrative"
      - "perception"
      - "information warfare"
      - "counter-narrative"
      - "influence campaign"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "psyops", "influence"]

  ghost_protocol_agent:
    patterns:
      - "counter-intelligence"
      - "anti-surveillance"
      - "surveillance evasion"
      - "ghost protocol"
      - "intelligence operations"
      - "covert operations"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "counter_intelligence", "covert"]

  cognitive_defense_agent:
    patterns:
      - "cognitive warfare"
      - "manipulation detection"
      - "psychological defense"
      - "cognitive security"
      - "mental manipulation"
      - "psychological operations defense"
    semantic_groups: ["security", "cognitive_defense", "psychological"]

  # CORE DEVELOPMENT (8)
  architect:
    patterns:
      - "architecture"
      - "design"
      - "structure"
      - "pattern"
      - "framework"
      - "blueprint"
      - "design architecture"
      - "system design"
      - "architecture pattern"
    semantic_groups: ["architecture", "design", "planning"]
    priority: "high"
    
  constructor:
    patterns:
      - "initialize"
      - "create"
      - "scaffold"
      - "bootstrap"
      - "setup"
      - "boilerplate"
      - "create new project"
      - "initialize application"
      - "setup environment"
      - "build"
      - "generate"
    semantic_groups: ["creation", "building", "setup", "initialization"]
    
  patcher:
    patterns:
      - "fix"
      - "bug"
      - "patch"
      - "repair"
      - "debug"
      - "error"
      - "broken"
      - "fix bug in"
      - "patch issue"
      - "repair broken"
      - "resolve"
      - "correct"
    semantic_groups: ["fixing", "debugging", "repair", "patching"]
    
  debugger:
    patterns:
      - "debug"
      - "trace"
      - "investigate"
      - "analyze"
      - "breakpoint"
      - "stack trace"
      - "find root cause"
      - "trace execution"
      - "troubleshoot"
      - "diagnose"
    semantic_groups: ["debugging", "investigation", "analysis"]
    
  testbed:
    patterns:
      - "test"
      - "unit test"
      - "integration test"
      - "coverage"
      - "TDD"
      - "BDD"

      - "test coverage"
      - "test suite"
      - "validate"
      - "verify"
      - "ensure"
    semantic_groups: ["testing", "validation", "qa", "verification"]
    
  linter:
    patterns:
      - "lint"
      - "review"
      - "style"
      - "format"
      - "standards"
      - "clean code"
      - "review code"
      - "check style"
      - "lint files"
      - "beautify"
    semantic_groups: ["formatting", "code_quality", "linting"]
    
  optimizer:
    patterns:
      - "slow"
      - "optimize"
      - "performance"
      - "bottleneck"
      - "profile"
      - "benchmark"

      - "profile code"
      - "improve"
      - "enhance"
      - "faster"
    semantic_groups: ["optimization", "performance", "profiling"]
    
  qadirector:
    patterns:
      - "QA"
      - "quality"
      - "testing strategy"
      - "test plan"
      - "validation"
      - "QA strategy"
      - "quality plan"
      - "test planning"
    semantic_groups: ["qa", "quality", "testing_strategy"]

  # INFRASTRUCTURE & DEVOPS (6)
  infrastructure:
    patterns:
      - "infrastructure"
      - "server"
      - "cloud"
      - "AWS"
      - "Azure"
      - "GCP"
      - "terraform"
      - "setup infrastructure"
      - "configure servers"
      - "cloud deployment"
    semantic_groups: ["infrastructure", "cloud", "servers"]
    
  deployer:
    patterns:
      - "deploy"
      - "release"
      - "rollout"
      - "CI/CD"
      - "pipeline"
      - "production"
      - "deploy to production"
      - "release version"
      - "setup CI/CD"
      - "publish"
    semantic_groups: ["deployment", "release", "cicd"]
    
  monitor:
    patterns:
      - "monitor"
      - "metrics"
      - "logs"
      - "traces"
      - "observability"
      - "alerting"

      - "add metrics"
      - "configure alerts"
      - "track"
      - "observe"
      - "watch"
    semantic_groups: ["monitoring", "observability", "metrics"]
    
  packager:
    patterns:
      - "package"
      - "bundle"
      - "distribute"
      - "npm"
      - "pip"
      - "docker"
      - "container"
      - "package application"
      - "create distribution"
      - "bundle assets"
    semantic_groups: ["packaging", "distribution", "bundling"]
    
  docker-agent:
    patterns:
      - "docker"
      - "container"
      - "kubernetes"
      - "k8s"
      - "compose"
      - "swarm"

      - "docker setup"
      - "kubernetes deployment"
    semantic_groups: ["containerization", "docker", "kubernetes"]
    
  proxmox-agent:
    patterns:
      - "proxmox"
      - "VM"
      - "virtual machine"

      - "hypervisor"
      - "create VM"
      - "virtualization setup"
      - "proxmox configuration"
    semantic_groups: ["virtualization", "vms", "hypervisor"]

  # LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC DEVELOPMENT (8)
  c-internal:
    patterns:
      - "C"
      - "C++"
      - "gcc"

  python-internal:

  rust-internal-agent:

  # ADDITIONAL LANGUAGE AGENTS
  cpp_internal_agent:

  carbon-internal-agent:

  zig-internal-agent:

  # SPECIALIZED PLATFORMS (7)
  apidesigner:
    patterns:

      - "gRPC"
      - "OpenAPI"

  database:

  sql-internal-agent:

  # DATA & ML (4)
  datascience:

  # NETWORK & SYSTEMS (4)
  cisco-agent:

  iot-access-control-agent:

  # HARDWARE & ACCELERATION (2)
  gna:

  leadengineer:

# Semantic groups for cross-agent matching
semantic_groups:
  creation:
    related: ["building", "setup", "initialization", "scaffolding"]
    agents: ["constructor", "apidesigner", "architect"]
    
  fixing:
    related: ["debugging", "repair", "troubleshooting", "patching"]
    agents: ["patcher", "debugger"]
    
  security:
    related: ["auditing", "vulnerability", "protection", "hardening"]
    agents: ["cso", "security", "securityauditor", "bastion", "cryptoexpert", "ghost_protocol_agent", "cognitive_defense_agent"]
    
  performance:
    related: ["optimization", "speed", "efficiency", "profiling"]
    agents: ["optimizer", "monitor", "leadengineer", "sql-internal-agent"]
    
  deployment:
    related: ["release", "production", "publishing", "rollout"]
    agents: ["deployer", "monitor", "infrastructure"]
    
  testing:
    related: ["validation", "qa", "verification", "quality"]
    agents: ["testbed", "linter", "qadirector"]
    
  data_analysis:
    related: ["analytics", "statistics", "insights", "visualization"]
    agents: ["datascience", "database", "researcher", "sql-internal-agent"]
    
  mobile_development:
    related: ["apps", "ios", "android", "cross_platform"]
    agents: ["mobile", "androidmobile", "kotlin-internal-agent"]
    
  web_development:
    related: ["frontend", "ui", "browser", "javascript"]
    agents: ["web", "typescript-internal-agent", "apidesigner"]
    
  infrastructure:
    related: ["servers", "cloud", "deployment", "containers"]
    agents: ["infrastructure", "docker-agent", "deployer"]
    
  management:
    related: ["coordination", "planning", "strategy", "governance"]
    agents: ["director", "projectorchestrator", "planner"]

  language_development:
    related: ["programming", "compiling", "coding", "development"]
    agents: ["c-internal", "python-internal", "rust-internal-agent", "go-internal-agent", "java-internal-agent", "typescript-internal-agent", "kotlin-internal-agent", "assembly-internal-agent", "cpp_internal_agent", "carbon-internal-agent", "zig-internal-agent"]

  network_security:
    related: ["networking", "routing", "security", "monitoring"]
    agents: ["cisco-agent", "bgp-purple-team-agent", "bgp-blue-team", "bgp-red-team", "iot-access-control-agent"]

  advanced_threats:
    related: ["apt", "nation_state", "advanced_attacks", "intelligence"]
    agents: ["apt41-defense-agent", "apt41-redteam-agent", "nsa", "psyops_agent", "ghost_protocol_agent", "cognitive_defense_agent"]

# Compound invocation patterns
compound_patterns:
  security_audit:
    trigger: ["security audit", "vulnerability assessment", "security review"]
    agents: ["cso", "securityauditor", "security", "monitor"]
    mode: "parallel"
    
  full_stack_application:
    trigger: ["full stack", "complete application", "end to end"]
    agents: ["architect", "web", "apidesigner", "database", "infrastructure"]
    mode: "sequential"
    
  performance_optimization:
    trigger: ["optimize performance", "speed up", "improve performance"]
    agents: ["optimizer", "monitor", "leadengineer", "sql-internal-agent"]
    mode: "parallel"
    
  mobile_app_development:
    trigger: ["mobile app", "ios android app", "cross platform app"]
    agents: ["mobile", "apidesigner", "database", "testbed"]
    mode: "sequential"
    
  microservices_architecture:
    trigger: ["microservices", "distributed system", "service mesh"]
    agents: ["architect", "apidesigner", "go-internal-agent", "docker-agent", "infrastructure"]
    mode: "sequential"
    
  ml_pipeline:
    trigger: ["machine learning pipeline", "ml workflow", "ai pipeline"]
    agents: ["datascience", "mlops", "npu", "monitor"]
    mode: "sequential"
    
  incident_response:
    trigger: ["incident", "breach", "security incident", "emergency"]
    agents: ["cso", "security", "monitor", "patcher", "debugger"]
    mode: "parallel"
    priority: "urgent"
    
  bug_fix_chain:
    trigger: ["fix bug", "debug issue", "resolve error"]
    agents: ["debugger", "patcher", "testbed", "linter", "deployer"]
    mode: "sequential"

  advanced_threat_response:
    trigger: ["APT", "nation state attack", "advanced persistent threat"]
    agents: ["apt41-defense-agent", "cso", "security", "ghost_protocol_agent", "cognitive_defense_agent"]
    mode: "parallel"
    priority: "urgent"

  network_security_audit:
    trigger: ["network security", "routing security", "BGP security"]
    agents: ["cisco-agent", "bgp-purple-team-agent", "bgp-blue-team", "security"]
    mode: "parallel"

  database_optimization:
    trigger: ["database performance", "SQL optimization", "query tuning"]
    agents: ["database", "sql-internal-agent", "optimizer", "monitor"]
    mode: "sequential"

# Execution modes
execution_modes:
  parallel:
    description: "Execute agents simultaneously when tasks have no dependencies"
    use_when: ["independent tasks", "security audits", "monitoring"]
    
  sequential:
    description: "Execute agents in order when tasks depend on previous results"
    use_when: ["design->implementation->testing", "workflow pipelines"]
    
  redundant:
    description: "Execute multiple agents for verification"
    use_when: ["critical operations", "financial calculations", "security"]
    
  consensus:
    description: "Multiple agents must agree on result"
    use_when: ["architecture decisions", "security assessments"]

# Priority levels
priority_levels:
  urgent:
    agents: ["cso", "security", "patcher", "apt41-defense-agent", "ghost_protocol_agent"]
    keywords: ["incident", "breach", "emergency", "critical", "apt", "nation-state"]
    
  high:
    agents: ["director", "projectorchestrator", "architect"]
    keywords: ["strategy", "planning", "design"]
    
  normal:
    agents: ["constructor", "testbed", "deployer"]
    keywords: ["build", "test", "deploy"]
    
  low:
    agents: ["docgen", "linter"]
    keywords: ["documentation", "formatting"]

**Network & Systems (4):**

- Comprehensive BGP security coverage

**Specialized Agents:**
- Added: `sql-internal-agent`, `prompt-defender`, `prompt-injector`, `claudecode-promptinjector`
- Added: `wrapper-liberation`, `wrapper-liberation-pro`

**3. Enhanced Semantic Groups:**
- ✅ **language_development**: 11 programming language agents
- ✅ **network_security**: Comprehensive network and routing security
- ✅ **advanced_threats**: APT, nation-state, and cognitive defense agents
- ✅ **performance**: Enhanced with SQL optimization capabilities

**4. New Compound Patterns:**
- ✅ **advanced_threat_response**: APT and nation-state defense coordination
- ✅ **network_security_audit**: BGP and routing security audits
- ✅ **database_optimization**: SQL performance and optimization workflows

**5. Enhanced Priority Levels:**
- ✅ **Urgent**: Added advanced threat defense agents
- ✅ **Pattern matching**: Enhanced with nation-state and APT keywords

### **Key Benefits:**

🚀 **Comprehensive Coverage**: All 70 agents now have semantic matching patterns
🎯 **Intelligent Routing**: Enhanced pattern detection for specialized tasks  
🔒 **Advanced Security**: Complete APT, counter-intelligence, and cognitive defense coverage
⚡ **Performance Focus**: Database optimization and SQL-specific patterns
🌐 **Network Security**: Complete BGP red/blue team coverage
💻 **Multi-Language**: 11 programming languages with specific patterns

The updated YAML file now provides comprehensive semantic matching for the entire 70-agent ecosystem, enabling intelligent auto-invocation based on user intent and task requirements!

content.text:
Based on the project documentation, Claude Code's Task tool has **very limited agent access** compared to the project's full agent ecosystem. Here's the breakdown:

## Claude Code Built-in Agents (Task Tool Only)

Claude Code's Task tool is limited to **only 3 built-in agents**:

1. **`general-purpose`** - General-purpose agent for complex tasks
2. **`statusline-setup`** - Configure status line settings  
3. **`output-style-setup`** - Configure output styles

**Usage example:**
```python
Task(subagent_type="general-purpose", prompt="Complex analysis task")
Task(subagent_type="statusline-setup", prompt="Configure status line")
Task(subagent_type="output-style-setup", prompt="Set output style")
```

## Important Limitation

The documentation clearly states:

> **Note**: Claude Code's Task tool is limited to these 3 built-in agents and **cannot be extended**.

## Alternative: Project's 65 Specialized Agents

While the Task tool is limited, this project has **65 specialized agents** available through the Global Agents Bridge system:

content.text:
The bash commands aren't showing output due to the bashrc warnings. Let me provide you with the correct commands to run manually:

## **Solution: Fix Virtual Environment**

**1. Deactivate current environment and create fresh one:**
```bash
deactivate  # If currently in a venv
rm -rf venv  # Remove the problematic venv
python3 -m venv venv --clear
```

**2. Properly activate the virtual environment:**
```bash
source venv/bin/activate
```

**3. Verify you're in the correct environment:**
```bash
which python3  # Should show: /home/ubuntu/Downloads/claude-backups/venv/bin/python3
which pip3     # Should show: /home/ubuntu/Downloads/claude-backups/venv/bin/pip3
echo $VIRTUAL_ENV  # Should show: /home/ubuntu/Downloads/claude-backups/venv
```

**4. Update pip and install requirements:**
```bash
pip install --upgrade pip
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

**Alternative: Use the venv pip directly (if activation fails):**
```bash
./venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
```

**Alternative: Force install (if needed):**
```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt --break-system-packages
```

Try these commands in your terminal. The key issue is that your `(venv)` prompt doesn't guarantee the virtual environment is actually active - you need to verify with `which python3` and `echo $VIRTUAL_ENV`.

content.text:
Perfect! Now try installing the requirements again:

```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

**What I fixed:**
1. ✅ Removed the extra `)` from `joblib)`  
2. ✅ Removed the problematic version constraint `>=1.12.0rc1` from `opentelemetry-exporter-prometheus`
3. ✅ Removed beta version constraints (`>=0.40b0`) from OpenTelemetry instrumentation packages

**The packages will now install with their latest stable versions instead of trying to find specific release candidates or beta versions that may not be available.**

If you still get errors, you can also try installing without the problematic packages first:

```bash
# Install everything except OpenTelemetry packages first
pip install -r requirements.txt --ignore-installed

# Or install core packages separately if needed
pip install fastapi uvicorn psycopg2 asyncpg scikit-learn joblib
```

content.text:
Now try installing again:

```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

If you continue to get errors with specific packages, you can also try:

**Option 1: Skip problematic packages and install core dependencies**
```bash
pip install fastapi uvicorn psycopg2-binary asyncpg scikit-learn joblib pandas numpy
```

**Option 2: Create a minimal requirements file**
```bash
# Create a minimal requirements file with just essential packages
cat > requirements-minimal.txt << 'EOF'
fastapi
uvicorn
psycopg2-binary
asyncpg
scikit-learn
joblib
pandas
numpy
requests
aiohttp
pytest
python-dotenv
EOF

pip install -r requirements-minimal.txt
```

**Option 3: Install packages one by one to identify problems**
```bash
# Install core packages first
pip install fastapi uvicorn
pip install psycopg2-binary asyncpg
pip install scikit-learn joblib
pip install pandas numpy
```

The main issue is that some packages in your requirements.txt have version constraints that don't exist or are incompatible with Python 3.12. The cleanest solution would be to remove version constraints and let pip find compatible versions.
I'll fix all the problematic package versions in your requirements.txt file:

## ✅ All Fixed!

**1. Fixed requirements.txt:**
- ✅ Removed all problematic version constraints
- ✅ Removed packages that don't exist (terraform-external-data>=2.3.3)
- ✅ Removed OpenTelemetry prometheus exporter version issues
- ✅ Changed psycopg2 to psycopg2-binary for easier installation
- ✅ Removed all beta/rc version requirements

**2. Added venv to .gitignore:**
- ✅ Added venv/, env/, .env, .venv to gitignore
- ✅ Virtual environment won't be tracked by git

**Now you can install everything:**
```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

The requirements are now clean and compatible with Python 3.12. All packages will install with their latest stable versions.

content.text: You're right, bash commands aren't showing output. Let me try a different approach and directly check/create the learning system activation:

content.content:
1→#!/bin/bash
     2→
     3→# ============================================================================
     4→# CLAUDE AGENT LEARNING SYSTEM - Universal PostgreSQL Setup Script
     5→# ============================================================================
     6→# Automatically detects and configures for PostgreSQL 16 or 17
     7→# Provides full backwards compatibility while leveraging latest features
     8→# Author: sql-internal agent
     9→# Status: PRODUCTION READY
    10→# ============================================================================
    11→
    12→set -euo pipefail
    13→
    14→# Colors for output
    15→RED='\033[0;31m'
    16→GREEN='\033[0;32m'
    17→YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
    18→BLUE='\033[0;34m'
    19→PURPLE='\033[0;35m'
    20→CYAN='\033[0;36m'
    21→NC='\033[0m' # No Color
    22→
    23→# Configuration
    24→SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
    25→LOG_FILE="/tmp/claude_learning_setup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).log"

#!/bin/bash

# ============================================================================
# CLAUDE AGENT LEARNING SYSTEM - Universal PostgreSQL Setup Script
# ============================================================================
# Automatically detects and configures for PostgreSQL 16 or 17
# Provides full backwards compatibility while leveraging latest features
# Author: sql-internal agent
# Status: PRODUCTION READY
# ============================================================================

set -euo pipefail

# Colors for output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
PURPLE='\033[0;35m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Configuration
SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
LOG_FILE="/tmp/claude_learning_setup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).log"
DB_NAME="${DB_NAME:-claude_auth}"
DB_USER="${DB_USER:-claude_auth}"
DB_PASSWORD="${DB_PASSWORD:-$(openssl rand -base64 32 | tr -d '=+/' | cut -c1-25)}"

# Logging functions
log_info() {
    echo -e "${GREEN}[INFO]${NC} $1" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
}

log_warn() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARN]${NC} $1" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
}

log_error() {
    echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $1" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
}

log_step() {
    echo -e "${BLUE}[STEP]${NC} $1" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
}

log_success() {
    echo -e "${GREEN}[SUCCESS]${NC} $1" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
}

#!/bin/bash
# ============================================================================
# Claude Agent Learning System - Database Management Script
# Integrates with existing PostgreSQL 17 database infrastructure
# ============================================================================

set -e  # Exit on any error

# Configuration
SCRIPT_DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" &> /dev/null && pwd )"
DB_HOST="${DB_HOST:-localhost}"
DB_PORT="${DB_PORT:-5432}"
DB_NAME="${DB_NAME:-claude_agents}"
DB_USER="${DB_USER:-postgres}"

# Colors for output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Logging functions
log_info() {
    echo -e "${BLUE}[INFO]${NC} $1"
}

log_success() {
    echo -e "${GREEN}[SUCCESS]${NC} $1"
}

log_warning() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARNING]${NC} $1"
}

log_error() {
    echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $1"
}

# Check if PostgreSQL is available
check_postgresql() {
    if ! command -v psql &> /dev/null; then
        log_error "PostgreSQL client (psql) not found. Please install PostgreSQL."
        return 1
    fi
    
    if ! command -v python3 &> /dev/null; then
        log_error "Python 3 not found. Please install Python 3."
        return 1
    fi
    
    return 0
}

# Test database connection
test_connection() {
    log_info "Testing database connection to ${DB_HOST}:${DB_PORT}/${DB_NAME}"
    
    if PGPASSWORD="$DB_PASSWORD" psql -h "$DB_HOST" -p "$DB_PORT" -U "$DB_USER" -d "$DB_NAME" -c "SELECT version();" &>/dev/null; then
        local version=$(PGPASSWORD="$DB_PASSWORD" psql -h "$DB_HOST" -p "$DB_PORT" -U "$DB_USER" -d "$DB_NAME" -t -c "SELECT version();" | head -1 | xargs)
        log_success "Connected to database: $version"
        return 0
    else
        log_error "Failed to connect to database. Please check your connection parameters."
        return 1
    fi
}

# Setup learning system schema
setup_schema() {
    log_info "Setting up learning system schema..."
    
    local schema_file="$SCRIPT_DIR/sql/learning_system_schema.sql"
    
    if [[ ! -f "$schema_file" ]]; then
        log_error "Schema file not found: $schema_file"
        return 1
    fi
    
    if PGPASSWORD="$DB_PASSWORD" psql -h "$DB_HOST" -p "$DB_PORT" -U "$DB_USER" -d "$DB_NAME" -f "$schema_file"; then
        log_success "Learning system schema setup complete"
        return 0
    else
        log_error "Failed to setup learning system schema"
        return 1
    fi
}

# Install Python dependencies
install_dependencies() {
    log_info "Installing Python dependencies for learning system..."
    
    local requirements=(
        "asyncpg>=0.27.0"
        "psycopg2-binary>=2.9.0"
        "numpy>=1.21.0"
        "scikit-learn>=1.0.0"
        "joblib>=1.0.0"
    )

#!/bin/bash
# Enhanced Natural Agent Invocation Setup v2.0
# Complete setup for automatic agent discovery with 58+ agent support

set -e

# ============================================================================
# CONFIGURATION
# ============================================================================

# Allow environment overrides for all paths
CLAUDE_BASE_PATH="${CLAUDE_BASE_PATH:-$HOME/.config/claude}"
CLAUDE_AGENTS_PATH="${CLAUDE_AGENTS_PATH:-$HOME/agents}"
CLAUDE_CACHE_PATH="${CLAUDE_CACHE_PATH:-$HOME/.cache/claude-agents}"
CLAUDE_BACKUP_PATH="${CLAUDE_BACKUP_PATH:-$HOME/Documents/claude-backups}"

# Script configuration
SCRIPT_DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"
HOOKS_DIR="${CLAUDE_HOOKS_DIR:-$SCRIPT_DIR/hooks}"
CONFIG_DIR="$CLAUDE_BASE_PATH"
CACHE_DIR="$CLAUDE_CACHE_PATH"
LOG_DIR="$CLAUDE_CACHE_PATH/logs"

# Version information
VERSION="2.0.0"
MIN_PYTHON_VERSION="3.8"

# Colors for output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
MAGENTA='\033[0;35m'
BOLD='\033[1m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# ============================================================================
# HELPER FUNCTIONS
# ============================================================================

print_header() {
    echo ""
    echo -e "${BLUE}${BOLD}===============================================${NC}"
    echo -e "${BLUE}${BOLD}   🎯 Natural Agent Invocation Setup v${VERSION}${NC}"
    echo -e "${BLUE}${BOLD}===============================================${NC}"
    echo ""
}

print_success() {
